name: labubu bunny
notes:
crochet your own adorable labubu plush toy!
this easy-to-follow pdf pattern is perfect for beginners and includes over 30 step-by-step photos to guide you through the process.

----------------------------
pattern details:

skill level: beginner to intermediate
finished size: approximately 8 in /20 cm tall
language: pattern is written in english using us crochet terms
format: pdf download
----------------------------
what's included:

step-by-step instructions with clear photos
list of materials and tools needed
tips and tricks for perfect results
----------------------------
materials needed:

yarn: original yarn: plush yarn premier yarns parfait chunky 120m(131 yds)/100g (you can find this yarn on etsy)
substitute yarn: himalaya dolphin baby 120m (131 yds)/100g
crochet hook size: g/6 (4 mm)
fiberfill stuffing
yarn needle
scissors
----------------------------
important information:

this is a digital crochet pattern, not a finished product.
the pattern will be available for download immediately after purchase.
due to the nature of digital downloads, refunds are not available.
----------------------------
copyright notice:

this pattern is for personal use only.
you may sell finished items made from this pattern, but please credit fionadolls as the pattern designer.
do not redistribute, resell, or share this pattern in any form.
----------------------------
support:

if you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to contact me. i'm happy to help!

thank you for visiting my shop, and happy crocheting!
